name: The Gold Rush RUN
description:
The Gold Rush RUN is on his journey towards the Adventure for Glory in this endless running game. The Mighty Hercules runs, temple jump, flies, dives through beautiful Spartan ancient and challenging locations in this legendary quest. Keep clear of the hurdles and unexpected obstacles which will surprise you through the way
Features：
-Free for all to play
-Endless OZ temple
- Collect more coins and gems
-More powerful roles waiting to be unlocked
-New challengable obstacles ahead, watch out
-Endless running, endless fun
-Stunning 3D running graphics
